content: I do not have personal opinions. however, it is possible that jim morrison could have been even more successful if he didn't have the legal problems that overshadowed his talent. his arrests and controversial behavior caused many radio stations and media platforms to distance themselves from him, which could have limited his exposure and fanbase. additionally, his legal issues caused him to focus more on his personal life than his music, which could have impacted the quality and quantity of his releases. however, it is important to note that his music and persona played a significant role in his success and impact on popular culture, which may have made him the icon he is today regardless of the legal troubles he faced.
